mapper.insert: insert into FDA_MONITOR_RECORD (ID, START_TIME, INPUT_FLOW_MIN, OUTPUT_FLOW_MIN, OPEN_MODE, UPSTREAM_WATERLINE_MIN, DOWNSTREAM_WATERLINE_MIN, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, END_TIME, MONITOR_RECORD_ID, INPUT_FLOW_MAX, OUTPUT_FLOW_MAX, UPSTREAM_WATERLINE_MAX, DOWNSTREAM_WATERLINE_MAX, MONITOR_TIME, MONITOR_AGENT, REPORTER, FDA_SHAPE_DESCRIPTION, FDA_CONCLUSION, STATION_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inputFlowMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{outputFlowMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{openMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upstreamWaterlineMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{downstreamWaterlineMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{monitorRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputFlowMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{outputFlowMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{upstreamWaterlineMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{downstreamWaterlineMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{monitorAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdaShapeDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdaConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update FDA_MONITOR_RECORD set START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INPUT_FLOW_MIN = #{inputFlowMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OUTPUT_FLOW_MIN = #{outputFlowMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OPEN_MODE = #{openMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPSTREAM_WATERLINE_MIN = #{upstreamWaterlineMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DOWNSTREAM_WATERLINE_MIN = #{downstreamWaterlineMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MONITOR_RECORD_ID = #{monitorRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_FLOW_MAX = #{inputFlowMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OUTPUT_FLOW_MAX = #{outputFlowMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, UPSTREAM_WATERLINE_MAX = #{upstreamWaterlineMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DOWNSTREAM_WATERLINE_MAX = #{downstreamWaterlineMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MONITOR_AGENT = #{monitorAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTER = #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDA_SHAPE_DESCRIPTION = #{fdaShapeDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDA_CONCLUSION = #{fdaConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATION_ID = #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, START_TIME, INPUT_FLOW_MIN, OUTPUT_FLOW_MIN, OPEN_MODE, UPSTREAM_WATERLINE_MIN, DOWNSTREAM_WATERLINE_MIN, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, END_TIME, MONITOR_RECORD_ID, INPUT_FLOW_MAX, OUTPUT_FLOW_MAX, UPSTREAM_WATERLINE_MAX, DOWNSTREAM_WATERLINE_MAX, MONITOR_TIME, MONITOR_AGENT, REPORTER, FDA_SHAPE_DESCRIPTION, FDA_CONCLUSION, STATION_ID from FDA_MONITOR_RECORD where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, START_TIME, INPUT_FLOW_MIN, OUTPUT_FLOW_MIN, OPEN_MODE, UPSTREAM_WATERLINE_MIN, DOWNSTREAM_WATERLINE_MIN, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, END_TIME, MONITOR_RECORD_ID, INPUT_FLOW_MAX, OUTPUT_FLOW_MAX, UPSTREAM_WATERLINE_MAX, DOWNSTREAM_WATERLINE_MAX, MONITOR_TIME, MONITOR_AGENT, REPORTER, FDA_SHAPE_DESCRIPTION, FDA_CONCLUSION, STATION_ID from FDA_MONITOR_RECORD
